welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hilden, Germany! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of our city, known for its historical landmarks, beautiful parks, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful stay and enjoy all that Hilden has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal of Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal dedicated to international flights, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
